name: Refreshing Chicken Tomato Pasta
description: This Refreshing Chicken Tomato Pasta is perfect for those who love a high-protein, low-sugar meal with the added benefits of healthified ingredients. Bursting with fresh basil, parsley, and the savory goodness of chicken leg quarters, served atop calendula noodles, it's not just a feast for the palate but a colorful spectacle on the plate. Ideal for anyone following a healthy lifestyle without compromising on taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Prep your ingredients: Finely chop the parsley, slice the garlic cloves, dice the red onion, and chop the fresh basil leaves.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Season the chicken leg quarters with salt and pepper to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a skillet, cook the seasoned chicken leg quarters over medium heat until they are golden brown and cooked through, about 25 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Boil water in a pot and cook the calendula noodles according to the package instructions, then drain.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: In another pan, saut√© the garlic and red onion until soft and fragrant, about 8 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the cooked chicken into bite-sized pieces and add them to the pan with garlic and onion.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Toss in the cooked calendula noodles with the chicken, garlic, and onions mixture.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the chopped fresh basil and parsley, and cook for an additional 5 minutes to let the flavors meld.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the pasta warm, garnished with extra basil or parsley if desired.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9
